identified_issues: TOKEN_INEFFICIENCY - Primary concern requiring Scout analysis
Suboptimal API call patterns in current implementation
Potential redundant token usage in AI provider interactions
Need for intelligent caching strategies to reduce API calls

specific_problems_to_solve: App is functional but burns through tokens quickly
API requests are not batched or optimized
No intelligent caching of common responses
Context is sent repeatedly instead of being managed efficiently
Need streaming responses instead of full token dumps
Multi-agent coordination could share context more efficiently
